comment.author: 34427469121@N01
comment._content:
"I don't believe any other city in the world offers a better collection of architectural cathedrals than Paris.
These inspiring sermons of stone are likely productions of the Sermon on The Mount. They need not words to convey their meaning for thoughts of God is aroused by gazing in awe and surrender at their beauty."

Paris, France
Soldiers Mail
Number Four (4)
